import "./intro.scss" import { init } from 'ityped' import { useEffect, useRef } from "react" export default function Intro({ eyeClosed, setEyeClosed }) { const textRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { init(textRef.current, { showCursor: false, strings: ["Hello!", "Welcome!", "Howdy!"], }); }, []); return (

_ _



I'm Daniel, a Front End Developer from London.



setEyeClosed(!eyeClosed)}>
Daniel Curtis
) }
